'''End stone bricks''' are decorative building [[block]]s made of [[End stone]] that generate in [[End cities]].

== Obtaining ==
=== Breaking ===
End stone bricks can be mined using any pickaxe. If mined without a pickaxe, it drops nothing.

{{breaking row|horizontal=1|End Stone Bricks|Pickaxe|Wood}}

=== Natural generation ===
End stone bricks can be found naturally as part of the structure of [[End cities]] and [[End ship]]s.

=== Crafting ===
{{Crafting
|A1= End Stone
|B1= End Stone
|A2= End Stone
|B2= End Stone
|Output= End Stone Bricks,4
|type=Building block
}}

=== Stonecutting ===
{{Stonecutting
|showname=1
|End Stone
|End Stone Bricks
}}

== Usage ==
End stone bricks are primarily decorative blocks, similarly to other brick-type blocks.

Like raw [[End stone]], End stone bricks have a blast resistance stronger than most other [[stone]] variants, except [[bedrock]] and [[obsidian]]. However, unlike End stone, End stone bricks can be destroyed by the [[ender dragon]].<ref>{{bug|MC-165218}}</ref>

=== Crafting ingredient ===
{{crafting usage}}

=== Stonecutting ingredient ===
{{Stonecutting
|showname=1
|End Stone Bricks
|End Stone Brick Slab, 2; End Stone Brick Stairs; End Stone Brick Wall
}}

=== Note blocks ===
End stone bricks can be placed under [[note block]]s to produce "bass drum" sounds.
